system:
note description: "Iterator for pixel values of EV_PIXEL_BUFFER" author: "" date: "$Date: 2016-07-15 21:44:59 -0700 (Fri, 15 Jul 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99025 $"
class ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_ITERATOR
inherit FalseBILINEAR [../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_PIXEL]
create {../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_I} ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_make_for_pixel_buffermake_for_pixel_buffer
feature {NONE} -- Creation
f_make_for_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_make_for_pixel_buffermake_for_pixel_buffer (a_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER) -- Make iterator for pixel buffer a_pixel_buffer. do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer := a_pixel_buffer.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_implementationimplementation create ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xml#f_set_pixel_bufferset_pixel_buffer (../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer) ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value := a_pixel_buffer.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_heightheight.Falseto_natural_32 ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value := a_pixel_buffer.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_widthwidth.Falseto_natural_32 end
feature
f_start../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_startstart -- Move to first position if any. do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := 1 ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow := 1 end
f_after../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_afterafter: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no valid position to the right of current one? do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow > ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value end
f_finish../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_finishfinish -- Move to last position. do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value end
f_forth../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_forthforth -- Move to next position; if no next position, -- ensure that exhausted will be true. do if ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn = ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value then ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := 1 ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow + 1 else ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn + 1 end end
f_before../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_beforebefore: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no valid position to the left of current one? do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow = 0 end
f_back../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_backback -- Move to previous position. do if ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn = 1 then ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow - 1 else ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn - 1 end end
f_is_empty../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_is_emptyis_empty: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no element? do end
f_set_column../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_set_columnset_column (a_column: FalseNATURAL_32) -- Set iterator to column a_column of ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer. require a_column_valid: a_column >= 1 and then a_column <= ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn := a_column end
f_column../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn: FalseNATURAL_32 -- Column index of ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_itemitem.
f_set_row../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_set_rowset_row (a_row: FalseNATURAL_32) -- Set iterator to row a_row of ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer. require a_row_valid: a_row >= 1 and then a_row <= ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow := a_row end
f_row../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow: FalseNATURAL_32 -- Row index of ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_itemitem.
f_item../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_itemitem: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_PIXEL -- Pixel at current iteration position. -- Object is reused for efficiency so retained references will be automatically updated. -- If not locked then a default pixel is returned. do if ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer.../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xml#f_is_lockedis_locked then Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item Result.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xml#f_sync_with_pixel_buffer_valuesync_with_pixel_buffer_value (../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn - 1, ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow - 1) else create Result end end
f_update_pixel../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_update_pixelupdate_pixel (a_column, a_row: FalseNATURAL_32; a_pixel: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_PIXEL) -- Update a_pixel with pixel value at a_column, a_row of Current. -- If not locked nothing is done. require a_column_valid: a_column >= 1 and then a_column <= ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value a_row_valid: a_row >= 1 and then a_row <= ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value do if ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer.../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xml#f_is_lockedis_locked then a_pixel.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xml#f_set_pixel_bufferset_pixel_buffer (../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer) a_pixel.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xml#f_sync_with_pixel_buffer_valuesync_with_pixel_buffer_value (a_column - 1, a_row - 1) end end
f_index../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_indexindex: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Index of current position. do Result := ((../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_rowrow - 1) * ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value + ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_columncolumn).Falseto_integer_32 end
f_max_column_value../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_column_valuemax_column_value: FalseNATURAL_32 -- Total number of columns for iteration.
f_max_row_value../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_max_row_valuemax_row_value: FalseNATURAL_32 -- Total number of rows for iteration.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_internal_item../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_pixel.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_PIXEL
f_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xml#f_pixel_bufferpixel_buffer: ../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_I -- Pixel buffer for which Current is iterating.

end -- class ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer_iterator.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_ITERATOR
